title: I have another new blog.
content:
That makes.... uh, one too many.

This is about signs and signage (the definition of "sign" being rather broad). I may keep it up.

[http://signobserver.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120802065531/http:/signobserver.wordpress.com/ "http://signobserver.wordpress.com/")

R
author: russellm
